title: Help, this account "lags" on every PC/Mac that i use
body:
i have no idea why this account lags when i play it. When i use my main account, everything is just smooth. It feels like im playing with 10FPS and my character just stutter steps like syndras bug. Help please, i have tried this account on multiple PCs and Macs and i still get the same results.

i have emailed riot multiple times but it looks like theyre never going to reply please help

replies.body:
It's possible you've accidentally got **movement prediction** enabled. This is a cloud-saved preference that can be found under the **GAME** options in-game. This setting is meant to improve gameplay on networks with a poor connection, however, if you have a good connection it will often just create micro-stutters in your character's movement. I've provided a screenshot below to assist you in making this change. 

(Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/uM2KB

Let me know if this causes any change.
